summary: Legion Helmet from Infinity Blade iphone game
descriptionHtml:
V1.1 contains steel, dwarven, and ebony versions each to match their armor types. They are all only slightly better than a regular helmet of that category. 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This here is my first helmet mod for skyrim. The legion helmet imho is the best looking/most functional looking helmet from the Infinity Blade games. It is craftable under daedric category and is enchantable and improvable.
Male and female heads supported but no argononian or khajit.
In the pics I didnt have any armor that matched the steel color of the helm but I think it still looks good.

My mods:
Hidans Scythe - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16401
Infinity Blade - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17255
Legion Helmet - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18341
Phoenix Katana - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16935
Stormfang Blade - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18494
Grayson Sword - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17552
Zabuzas Executioner Blade - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16753
author: siberok92

files.name: Legion Helmet
files.changelogHtml: steel , dwarven , and ebony versions added all craftable under their respective categories
